scripts.test: TS_NODE_PROJECT=tsconfig.mocha.json mocha -r ts-node/register tests/**/*.spec.ts src/**/*.spec.ts tests/**/*.spec.ts src/**/*.spec.tsx --watch --ignore node_modules --extension ts,tsx --recursive
scripts.test:watch: TS_NODE_PROJECT=tsconfig.mocha.json mocha -r ts-node/register tests/**/*.spec.ts src/**/*.spec.ts tests/**/*.spec.ts src/**/*.spec.tsx --watch --ignore node_modules --extension ts,tsx --recursive
